title: Maher's monologue
content: Topics this week: Crossing the comedic line (Roseanne and Samantha B), how the Repugnantan Party reinforces such racism, how Dump makes this all about him, snowflake, idiot conservatives, Dump's historic Blight House meeting with Kim Kardashian.

feed.name: Proactive Progressive Propagation
feed.description: Formerly Proactive Progressive Participation. Join the resistance! My idiosyncratic and confluent bricolage of progressive politics, the collaborative commons, next generation cognitive neuroscience, American pragmatism, de/reconstruction, dynamic systems
